attributes.action: Molly Watt (age 17)  - Denied because she is a deafblind guidedog owner
attributes.additional_details:
Molly is currently being made to be without the safety of her guidedog Unis at various times when at school or to be in situations of isolation and exclusion when at school, causing her upset, anxiety and stress.
Everytime the use of her guidedog is taken from her she is in serious danger of hurting herself both physically and mentally.
Please help us help her and all Guidedog Owners live their lives to the full without prejudice.....
Thank you for your support...
